# Public Finance & Regulation â€“ Compliance Requirements

## Mandatory Requirements
- All public finance activities must be compliant by default.
- Compliance validation must precede execution where required.
- Violations must be explicitly recorded and reported.

## Reporting Expectations
- Reports must be accurate, complete, and timely.
- Reporting sources must be verifiable.
- Corrections must follow formal amendment processes.

## Forbidden
- Skipping compliance validation
- Silent compliance failures
- Non-disclosed reporting corrections
